about_the_game:
What Is It ?

Story heavy turnbased combat Pixel/3d RPG with a story arc that stretch far beyond what you can imagine.

Plot twists , curve balls, politics, religion, love , hate , sorrow,  a mature story that sometimes is unfair (i'm sorry) you will either love or hate the characters in Seed of God but always have a desire to push on and explore and experience the journey together with the main cast  and the kingdom of Riebenhelm in this tragic but hopeful saga.

Put yourself into detective mode for this game will not hold your hand , if you solve a secret or mystery you will be rewarded with a feel that you accomplished using your own reasoning skills for game will not tell you with flashing map markers.

 


Avelon

A distant world surrounded by a endless Sea and shrouded in mist, protected by God and the Pillar of light Avelons inhabitants pray everyday to keep it so.
With fear everyone remember what happend a millennia ago.  Whispers of a crazy king in the east may once again put avelon in danger.

Exploration

Several towns with completely different character and look with stores, sidequests , taverns and secrets awaits to be discovered.

Talk to people to uncover their story or initiate quests that will or will not reward you. Dive into the books at the library to understand the world or find solutions to mysteries

Step into the worldmap and explore at your own pace.

Good or Bad ?

You will constantly be faced with morale dilemmas or choices that define who you are or how events unfold and can even affect relationship with characters in Kingdom of Riebenhelm.

But caution ! you often only have one chance to make a decision and save scumming is made limited.

Also, you may or may not know beforehand how or when your choiceds will affect the gameplay so be prepared to live with the consequence of your choice.

Earn Chards

Use token earned through quests and combat to unlock new skills and magic 

Turnbased Combat

With several partymembers you combat both random encounters and visible threats using weapons , skills , items and magic and your partymembers
brings their own unique weapons and skills to aid you in battle.

Gain experience points to level up your stats and beat even greaters foes all who are    created unique for this game

Influences

Developer grew up in the golden era of JRPG and Finalfantasy 7 & 9 influenced greatly how character arcs and story is told in Seed of God. 

Game is best described as a mix between Witcher3/GoT dark storytelling and Finalfantasy 7 9 10 type of gameplay with larger than life story.

Amazing soundtracks that will make you stop and listen more then once .

Main Story

Story is aimed at a mature audience so expect the unexpected at any given time as you travel. It is a tale of great tragedy but with a seed of hope and alot of humor.
It will take you through several towns and uniqe locations throughout your adventure and
characters you meet will be given plenty of space to tell their own story for you to dive into the lore.

Game description and trailers are kept spoiler free but expect a journey of EPIC proportions

If you want to support , be part of the game or or give the alone developer some motivation please visit the games discord .

Currently running a kickstarter

short_description: Seed of God is a epic scale turnbased Pixel/3d JRPG with a characterdriven story that will take you on a unforgettable journey beyond what you may imagine. Constantly faced with choices that define your morale(Good/Bad)and change events as you explore the world of Avelon and unfold this epic saga
